name: Be A Bean
description:
This Is A Passion Project. This Is A Bad Game. This Is Also The Pre-Pre-Alpha Stage.

The Menu Is The Most Interesting Thing In The Game. Which Is DISAPOINTING.

99% Of This game Is Unfinished And Bad.

Jokes aside i hope you have at least a LITTLE enjoyment with this, it's nowhere NEAR finished. 

if you'd like small dev-logs, you can go to my YouTube channel. who knows what bad content you may find there O-o
